entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid project created when name has `&` (ampersand) or ` ` (space) in it #56765
  • API description provider not lifting Container type of properties #56764
  • ApiDescriptionProvider does not return SupportedResponseTypes when using controllers with Results<T> #56763
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.Core.IISHttpContext.ExtraFeatureSet #56762
  • Future of standalone WASM applications #56761
  • Blazor server app slow build time #56759
  • Auth middleware should respond with ProblemDetails #56757
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextSansFilter #56756
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.StaticWebAssets.targets unable to publish when static web assets been removed after build phase #56755
  • Sliding expiry for hybrid cache #56754

Closed

  • Regression: HTTP 401 using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 8.0.7 #56727
  • Analyzer to warn when [Authorize] is overridden by [AllowAnymous] from "farther" away #56310
    9.0-preview7
  • Question - Where does Visual Studio store https or IIS Express option for a Blazor project? #48074
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.NavigationException:“Exception_WasThrown” #55831
  • Spring 2024 repo health check #55323
  • Add endpoint metadata to disable HTTP metrics #56039
    9.0.0
  • Metadata to exclude request from http.server.request.duration metric #50654
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #56739
  • basic Hot Reload fails when modifying razor pages in external library/project #56600
  • Broken localization after "Publish" from resources from the "Shared" library in the Blazor WASM client #56560

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #56766
    area-signalr
  • using one style approach for all 3 configs WebAssembly, Web and Server #56758
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use new PipeWriter Json overloads #55740
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • update tsaconfig #56749
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `34ad51b` to `b4aaf97` #56760
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview7
  • Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56631
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview7
  • Add disable HTTP metrics endpoint metadata #56036
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview7
  • Improve endpoint extension method docs #56713
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753
    area-web-frameworks
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Update Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.csproj #56659
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
  • Updated naming pattern used the s_ prefix for private static fields #56647
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the hub client proxy generator correctly processes both explicit and inferred generic type arguments #55862
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add support for the Partitioned cookie attribute #55371
    area-networking
